description.title: description
description.text: I think for this piece, I made the left hand stretch a little too much, so in the PDF version, you'll see me reduce the size a little.

description.title: description
description.text: I think I did this cover purely because of the part before the chorus. I always found that part to be the most powerful and epic part of the song. 'Look me in the eyes' that part. Otherwise, the rest of the song is just ok.

description.title: description
description.text: This was one of my first song covers, and though it may be quite simple, I do like the song a LOT. The sections of the song flow VERY well, and have a noticeable buildup of energy.

description.title: description
description.text: Melody was beautiful, though I'd appreciate a more varied bassline, as I found it a little hard to add additional layers to it.

description.title: description
description.text: This was one of the songs where I waited for the exact moment the song was released before creating the cover. I think this was the fastest I took to transcribe the song, as I took less than an hour to finish this. Quality is as you'd expect from an hour's work.

description.title: description
description.text: I found the chords for this song to be very interesting, even by TWICE standards, so I had to try them out for myself. Notable chords were the III and VIIb chords, which are used very effectively here. Very cheerful!

i-know-what-you-did-last-summer.title: I know what you did last summer

description.title: description
description.text: This song was all over the place, and very messy. I don't like what I've done with this.

description.title: description
description.text: This song is very calm and soothing, and I made sure that I focussed on that aspect in this cover. One of my earliest covers.

description.title: description
description.text: After making covers of old songs, this was the first song past 2019 that I covered, and the quality is as you'd expect. Too ambitious with the right hand, and a very messy left hand.

description.title: description
description.text:
This piece was by far my favourite one to create. It features 50 meme-like songs all woven together into one song. Lots of careful planning was done to make sure the progessions are all compatible with each other, and there were no sudden change in BPM between movements.
- This Girl (Shot on iPhone) [1]
- Astronomia (Coffin Dance) [2]
- Bring Me To Life (Wake Me Up) [3]
- Dancin (Ricardo Milos) [4]
- 7 элемент (7th Element) [5]
- Bad Guy (Billie Eilish) [6]
- Kahoot Lobby Music [7]
- Sweet Dreams (Are Made of This) [8]
- Ding Dong Song (Tralala) [9]
- Song for Denise (Wide Putin) [10]
- Crab Rave (Noisestorm) [11]
- Crazy Frog (Axel F) [12]
- Megalovania (Undertale) [13]
- Revenge (Creeper Aw Man) [14]
- My Heart Will Go On (Titanic) [15]
- Yi Jian Mei 一剪梅 (Xue Hua Piao Piao) [16]
- Baka Mitai 馬鹿みたい (Dame Da Ne) [17]
- Boulevard of Broken Dreams (Green Day) [18]
- Pumped Up Kicks (Foster The People) [19]
- Old Town Road (Lil Nas X) [20]
- The Bad Touch (Bloodhound Gang) [21]
- I'm A Gummy Bear (Gummibär) [22]
- Ievan Polkka (Loituma) [23]
- If I Had A Chicken (Kevin MacLeod) [24]
- The Lion Sleeps Tonight (A-weema-weh) [25]
- Baby Shark (Pinkfong) [26]
- Il Vento D’Oro (Giorno’s Theme) [27]
- PPAP (Pikotaro) [28]
- The Lick (Jazz Cliché) [29]
- Pokémon Theme (Gotta Catch ‘Em All) [30]
- Through The Fire And Flames (DragonForce) [31]
- Silhouette シルエット (Naruto) [32]
- Take Me Home, Country Roads (John Denver) [33]
- Caramelldansen (Caramella Girls) [34]
- Dragostea Din Tei (Numa Numa) [35]
- It’s Not Like I Like You (My Tsundere Girl) [36]
- Makudonarudo (Namewee) [37]
- Dance Monkey (Tones And I) [38]
- Chikatto Chika Chika (Chika Dance) [39]
- Guren No Yumiya 紅蓮の弓矢 (Attack On Titan) [40]
- Shinzou Wo Sasageyo 心臓を捧げよ (Attack On Titan) [41]
- We Are Number One (LazyTown) [42]
- B**** Lasagna (PewDiePie) [43]
- The Avengers Main Theme [44]
- The Final Countdown (Europe) [45]
- Run Away (Epic Sax Guy) [46]
- Basshunter DotA (Ricardo Milos) [47]
- Africa (Toto) [48]
- Despacito (Luis Fonsi) [49]
- Among Us (Reporting Body) [50]

description.title: description
description.text: This was one of the bigger projects I've done, as I tried to combine all of the NDP songs into one medley. I struggled a lot with trying to arrange them in a cohesive and non-disruptive way. But I think some songs really CMI.

description.title: description
description.text: This was my most viewed sheet music on MuseScore, with over 350k views. Despite this, I think this was one of my laziest pieces, as the left hand had absolutely no changes throughout. Just copy and paste.

description.title: description
description.text: I found the melody to be very fun to play on piano. Lots of interesting twists (such as the sneaky iv chord)!

description.title: description
description.text: The nice part of this song is the interesting use of chords. However, the chords don't change throughout the song, so it was hard to make the left hand more varied.

description.title: description
description.text: For the longest time, this was by far my most successful video, and the sheet music was requested by well over 60 people. It went through several iterations, so this one is the best I have so far. Hope you like it!

description.title: description
description.text: I made sure that the chorus was very strong and powerful, which was liked about the song. I also included lots more arpeggios, which definitely helped to fill in empty spaces quite well.

description.title: description
description.text: My favourite part of the song is the pre-chorus, where the chord progression really shines. Even though it is very simple, the way The Script plays it is really powerful.

description.title: description
description.text: This is currently my most viewed video on YouTube, though I'm sure this is just because of the song's popularity. I didn't take THAT long on the cover, which was why parts of it were quite awkward to listen to.

description.title: description
description.text: Alan Walker does produce some nice songs. This was not one of the popular ones, but I did find it quite fun to cover.

description.title: description
description.text: This was the first cover I did when I first downloaded MuseScore. I paid a lot of attention to making it as accurate as possible. This meant going to my piano and trying out different patterns in both the left and right hand. In the end, it didn't matter that much, as I now don't like how it turned out.
